ModMetaData.name: Foundations (Update)
ModMetaData.author: qm
ModMetaData.description:
Resurrected mod. All credits go to Lurmey and iforgotmysocks.
Original description: Two simple foundations, allowing you to build on otherwise unsuitable terrain (including mud and marsh). Perfect for use with terraforming mods such as Fertile Fields, or simply for immersion!
Features
Concrete Foundation - Quick-pour concrete for building on any diggable terrain. Supports Heavy
Wooden Foundation - Rammed wooden beams for building on any bridgeable terrain. Supports Medium
Realistic Removal - Foundations will choose appropriate terrain to turn into.
Mod Support Simple Concrete Concrete (Continued) RF Concrete (Continued) Expanded Woodworking Alpha Biomes
Requires Harmony
Recommended Mods Floors Are Light!, which patches Vanilla and Stuffed floors to require more realistic affordances.
Known Issues None!
Credits Huge thanks to iforgotmysocks for coding the removal designator, terrain selection logic and being all around fantastic! Thanks to NECEROS for requesting the above and providing it to me to pull into the mod (also inviting me to the Rimworld Discord server. Thanks!)
By the way, I'm not a good texture artist. If anyone can design a better texture for the Wooden Foundation, please get in touch! Right now, it really gives meaning to the "Staggeringly Ugly" trait...
